Motivo de bromas en Twitter
Rivera saca a pasear al cachorro Lucas antes del debate: "Aún huele a leche"
03 Nov 2019, 17:40 by La Información

El simpático animalito parece el último talismán del político al que recurre para que le ayude a subir en las encuestas.

En política todo vale, o casi. Al menos algo así ha debido pensar el líder de Ciudadanos Albert Rivera, que ha decidido colgar en su cuenta de instagram un vídeo con un pequeño cachorro, Lucas.
El simpático animalito parece el último talismán al que recurre para que le ayude a subir en las encuestas, últimamente poco favorables para la formación naranja. A una semana de las elecciones generales, y a escasas horas del debate a cinco que puede marcar la deriva del voto indeciso, Rivera ha señalado en su perfil de Twitter: "Lucas, hemos grabado un vídeo juntos en Instagram y los rivales del debate ya hablan de ti. ¡Bienvenido, ya eres parte de la familia ‘ciudadana’!".
Suponemos que se trata de la respuesta a algunos de sus rivales, como Iñigo Errejón, que antes un tuitero que ha colgado el vídeo en cuestión ha escrito: "Es hora de hablar en serio de política y dejarnos de bobadas".
En cualquier caso, las bromas más sarcásticas de los tuiteros han venido dadas por la frase que pronuncia el líder de Cs durante la breve grabación, cuando levanta al perrito y dice "aún huele a leche". Esta aseveración ha despertado la acidez de los usuarios de la red social.
text:
Reason for jokes on Twitter
Rivera takes the puppy Lucas for a walk before the debate: "It still smells like milk"
03 Nov 2019, 17:40 by The Information

The cute little animal looks like the last talisman of the politician he turns to to help him get on the polls.

In politics everything goes, or almost. At least something like this should have been thought by the leader of Citizens Albert Rivera, who has decided to post a video with a small puppy, Lucas, on his Instagram account.
The cute little animal looks like the last talisman he uses to help him get on the polls, lately unfavorable for the orange formation. A week after the general election, and within a few hours of the five-year debate that can lead to the drift of the undecided vote, Rivera said on his Twitter profile: "Lucas, we have recorded a video together on Instagram and the rivals of the debate are already talking from you. Welcome, you are already part of the 'citizen' family! "
We assume that this is the answer to some of his rivals, such as Iñigo Errejón, who before a tweeter who has posted the video in question has written: "It's time to talk seriously about politics and stop fooling around."
In any case, the most sarcastic jokes of the tweeters have been given by the phrase pronounced by the leader of Cs during the brief recording, when he lifts the puppy and says "it still smells like milk". This statement has awakened the acidity of the users of the social network.
